title: Week 6 Matchups + Ertz Traded, Wheel of Shame - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/15
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to help you get a Win in Week 6! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of Week 6 matchup breakdowns and injury updates. Plus, a recap of the Eagles vs Buccaneers game, and the “Wheel of Shame” in the Fantasy Faceoff segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 15th, 2021.
  
 (02:00) - Thursday Night Recap
 (10:10) - FootClan Friday
 (10:55) - NFL News
 (21:40) - Fantasy Forecast
 (22:15) - Chargers at Ravens
 (25:45) - Cardinals at Browns 
 (30:45) - Raiders at Broncos
 (34:30) - Cowboys at Patriots
 (40:35) - Seahawks at Steelers
 (45:00) - Bills at Titans
 (51:55) - Fantasy Faceoff + Wheel of Shame
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
